requiredValidation: The field {{field}} is required and must be filled out.
requiredPhoneWithCode: You must select a country code and enter a phone number.
minValidation: The field {{field}} must have a minimum value of {{min}}.
maxValidation: The field {{field}} must have a maximum value of {{max}}.
minLengthValidation: The field {{field}} must be at least {{min}} characters long.
maxLengthValidation: The field {{field}} cannot be more than {{max}} characters long.
rangeValidation: The field {{field}} must be between {{min}} and {{max}}.
exactLengthValidation: The field {{field}} must be exactly {{length}} characters long.
emailValidation: The field {{field}} must be a valid email address.
urlValidation: The field {{field}} must be a valid URL.
phoneValidation: The field {{field}} must be a valid phone number.
numericValidation: The field {{field}} must contain only numbers.
integerValidation: The field {{field}} must be an integer.
positiveValidation: The field {{field}} must be a positive number.
dateValidation: The field {{field}} must be a valid date.
futureDate: The field {{field}} must be a future date.
pastDate: The field {{field}} must be a past date.
